bill_title: require the Board of Regents to prepare a plan for the establishment of a community college system in South Dakota.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the Board of Regents to prepare a plan for the establishment of a community college system in South Dakota. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Board of Regents shall prepare a plan providing for the establishment of a community college system in South Dakota, and shall present that plan to the Governor and to the Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council no later than November 1, 2012. The plan shall provide for a system of community colleges with an emphasis on liberal arts and vocational education that is part of a unified system of higher education in South Dakota. Under the terms of the plan, the community colleges within the system shall provide the following education programs: (1) Two-year college transfer programs that allow students to continue their education at other institutions of higher education; (2) Two-year general education programs; and (3) Other appropriate educational programs and services as determined by the Board of Regents. The plan prepared by the board shall include recommendations on the number of community colleges needed, where the community colleges should be located, any possible funding sources for the establishment of community colleges, and any other recommendation at the discretion of the board.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
